ServerPackage.ServerControllers

Class InventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerPackage.ServerControllers.InventoryController

  • public class InventoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Inventory controller class. This class is used to manipulate the inventory and the items inside it.
    Since:
    April 5, 2019
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Victor Sanchez, Shamez Meghji, Jake Lui

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DataBaseController data
      The database controller to update it.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<ItemModel> items
      The items kept by the inventory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InventoryController(DataBaseController dc)
      Constructs the inventory with items found on the database.

        public ItemModel findItem(int id)
        Finds the item using the id, returns null if not found.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to find.
        Returns:
        the item found with the matching id.

      • findItem

        protected ItemModel findItem(java.lang.String desc)
        Finds the item using the name/description.
        Parameters:
        desc - the name of the item to find.
        Returns:
        the item found or null if not found.

      • checkIfOrder

        protected boolean checkIfOrder()
        Checks if there is a need to order items.
        Returns:
        true if there is a need to order.

        Generates an order and updates the necessary list.
        Parameters:
        o - the order model used to create an order line.

      • updateItem

        protected void updateItem(ItemModel item)
        Updates a pre-existing item to a given item and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:

      • updateItemsSuppliers

        public void updateItemsSuppliers(java.util.ArrayList<SupplierModel> supp)
        Joins the items and the suppliers by updating the suppliers in the items.
        Parameters:
        supp - the list of suppliers to add.
